| HistoryText             = Stationed atop the [[Skornheim Mountains]], the Dragon-Gunners are a squadron of [[Dwarves of Nidavellir|Dwarves]] of [[Nidavellir]] that focus on taking down aerial enemies. During an attack from [[Muspelheim]], the Dragon-Gunners took down a firefly rider transporting maggot bombs.{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 3 20}}
